General.Name: Bank BRISyariah Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. The company operates through Corporate Banking, Commercial Banking, Institutional Relation, Retail, and Treasury Banking segments. It offers banking products and services, such as demand deposits, savings, and time deposits; micro financing; working capital and investment financing; and internet banking services. The company also provides movable or immovable goods purchase finance leasing services; debit and financing cards; buying, selling, and guaranteeing third party securities; and trustee, custodian, buyer and supplier financing, distributor financing, and bank guarantee services; and refinancing, multi financing, and sharia current account financing services. PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Syariah Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk.
General.Address: The Tower Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12930
